1101001101100010 0000101011010000 0 -> sum: 1101111000110010, cout: 0
1111010110111000 0001001011001000 0 -> sum: 0000100010000000, cout: 1
1110001011010101 1101001010101001 0 -> sum: 1011010101111110, cout: 1
0011001101111010 1000010110001001 1 -> sum: 1011100100000100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
